document.full_text: cvs caremark corp's  former chief executive, thomas ryan, who recently retired after a 12-year tenure as ceo of the u.s. drugstore chain, took home more than $120 million in 2010.
document.title: cvs ex-ceo takes home over $120 million for 2010
lines_and_colors: cvs caremark corp's  former chief executive, thomas ryan, who recently retired after a 12-year tenure as ceo of the u.s. drugstore chain, took home more than $120 million in 2010.
